name: Legal Notice - Defamation
description: Legal notice for defamatory statements seeking retraction and apology

fields.label: Medium of Publication
fields.placeholder: Social media / Newspaper / Public speech / etc.

body: Subject: Legal Notice for Defamation under Section 499 and 500 of the Indian Penal Code, 1860
Under instructions from and on behalf of my client {{client_name}}, I hereby serve upon you the following legal notice:
1. That on {{publication_date}}, you made/published the following defamatory statement: "{{defamatory_statement}}".
2. That the said statement was made/published through {{publication_medium}}.
3. That the aforesaid statement is false, baseless, malicious, and defamatory in nature.
4. That the said statement was made with the deliberate intention to harm the reputation of my client and lower him/her in the estimation of right-thinking members of society.
5. That as a consequence of your defamatory statement, my client has suffered {{harm_description}}.
6. That your act of publishing defamatory statements constitutes an offence punishable under Sections 499 and 500 of the Indian Penal Code, 1860, and also gives rise to civil liability.

body.text: 7. That my client has suffered quantifiable loss of reputation, mental agony, and financial loss, and is entitled to claim damages of ₹{{damages_claimed}} (Rupees {{damages_claimed}} only).
(d) Pay damages of ₹{{damages_claimed}} to my client within 15 (fifteen) days from the receipt of this notice.

body: TAKE NOTICE that if you fail to comply with the above demands within the stipulated period, my client shall be constrained to initiate appropriate criminal and/or civil proceedings against you for defamation, claiming damages, costs, and all consequential reliefs, without any further reference to you.
This notice is issued without prejudice to all other rights and remedies available to my client under law.
